Description: Body sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black with traces of added white bands; exterior: painted decoration consisting of hound (part of snout remaining), to right; part of pendant roundel, swastika and dotted rosette as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 251, no. 379, pl. 54)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0178) (phase 2)
